name: izuni
description: Izuni is a creative agency based in Bournemouth on the South coast of England, that specializes in Â E-Commerce, Branding, and CMS, creating bespoke websites for all kinds of businesses and individuals. They strive in doing their bit to make the internet more beautiful, accessible and engaging. Attention to detail is extremely important, They have experience working alongside developers. Izuni uses CS6 Photoshop, InDesign and Illustrator. Their other passion is the photography and cars.
